traits.name: Aggressive
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

traits.name: Demon’s Aim
traits.desc: As a bonus action, the orc can choose to tap into its demonic blood to make its next shot. The orc’s next ranged attack takes a -3 penalty to the attack roll. If the attack hits, add +6 to the attack’s damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The orc makes two attacks with its longbow or with its shortswords.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) necrotic damage.

actions.name: Shortsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Volley (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The orc makes a ranged attack against any number of creatures within 10 feet of a point it can see within its weapon’s range. It makes a separate attack roll for each target.
